description: Try our easy to follow Crackling Pork Leg Roast with Roasted Potatoes & Festive Green Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast pork,Roast,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Potato,Soy free,Wheat free,Pork,Peanut free
name: Crackling Pork Leg Roast with Roasted Potatoes & Festive Green Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove Pork Leg roast from packaging, taking note of weight and pat dry with paper towel.
Place roast onto a wire rack in the kitchen sink and pour over a jug of boiling water. Pat the rind dry with paper towel.
Rub the rind well with oil and sea salt massaging well into the scored areas.
Place the Pork Leg roast on the wire rack into a deep roasting pan and place the leg roast into the preheated oven 240°C for 40 minutes. Do not open oven door during this period.
Reduce oven temperature to 180°C for the remaining cooking time allow 3035 minutes per kg. Add potatoes to the roasting pan.
Remove Pork from the oven and allow to rest in the roasting pan 1015 minutes prior slicing.
Serve pork hot with roasted potatoes and festive salad.
